text: Hi all. I’m following the HubSpot CMS for Developers and created a new theme based on the CMS Boilerplate theme. Lots of things in these videos seem to have been updated/changed/moved since they were done. But one of the issues I’m running into is this video by <@U05S0CX1QLW> says to link to the /boilerplate/css/layout.css for the dnd 12 column grid. Where do I find that CSS file?
